    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LightSensor
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class is used to get the color of the bricks for flag recognition.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This method runs in a thread to update the value captured by the light sensor. This value will be treated in the CaptureFlag class to see if the robot detected the correct flag.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:

Class LightSensor

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.LightSensor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class LightSensor
extends java.lang.Thread

This class is used to get the color of the bricks for flag recognition.

Constructor Detail

LightSensor

public LightSensor()
The constructor initializes the sensor's parameters.

Method Detail

run

public void run()
This method runs in a thread to update the value captured by the light sensor. This value will be treated in the CaptureFlag class to see if the robot detected the correct flag.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread
